arts.ttl: ‘We are way behind our potential’ – Niko Kovac critical of Borussia Dortmund performance
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund suffered successive Bundesliga defeats under Niko Kovac, losing 2-0 to their Ruhr neighbours Bochum on Saturday afternoon. A brace from Georgios Masouras means BVB now sit eight points…

arts.ttl: Schlotterbeck issues warning to Dortmund after Bochum defeat: "Otherwise it will be a horror season..."
arts.sum: Nico Schlotterbeck says Borussia Dortmund must get their "basics" right if they are to avoid a "horror season".

arts.ttl: Post Match Reactions: Bochum Put Another Dent in BVB’s Top Four Hopes
arts.sum: A gift from Niklas Süle and and a tidy finish from Giorgos Masouras was all that Bochum needed, as BVB ended up with a performance that was a mix of bad luck and football way below club standards. It’s simply an acknowledgement of the fact that he is the only BVB player who can decide games on his own—and when Dortmund aren’t playing well, it’s naturally frustrating to be subbed off when you are perfectly aware of that fact.

arts.ttl: Georgios Masouras double stuns Borussia Dortmund as Bochum claim relegation lifeline
arts.sum: Georgios Masouras scored twice as Bochum secured a 2-0 victory over Borussia Dortmund to boost their survival hopes and hand BVB a second successive defeat under new head coach Niko Kovač. Dortmund struggled to find their rhythm, with their first real opportunity coming in the 11th minute when Julian Brandt's effort was well saved by Timo Horn, making his Bundesliga debut for Bochum.

arts.ttl: Dortmund slumps to second defeat from two Bundesliga games under new coach Niko Kovać
arts.sum: Masouras stunned the visitor with his first goal for Bochum since his winter switch from Olympiakos, then capitalized almost straight away on a huge error from Dortmund defender Niklas Süle to grab his second in the first half. Georgios Masouras scored twice in two minutes for bottom club Bochum to upset Borussia Dortmund 2-0 in their Bundesliga derby on Saturday.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Big wins for Bochum and Gladbach, Wolfsburg and Freiburg snatch late winners
arts.sum: Across the Bundesliga this afternoon, Bochum picked up a fantastic derby win against Borussia Dortmund, whilst Borussia Mönchengladbach, Wolfsburg and Freiburg all took three points.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Niko Kovac Seeks First Bundesliga Victory Against Bochum
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Absolutely no illegal streams.

arts.ttl: ‘Calm, composed and settled’ – Borussia Dortmund boss Lars Ricken praises Daniel Svensson
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund boss Lars Ricken spoke on his new coach and his new left back at a Friday-released engagement on BVB-TV.

arts.ttl: Bochum goalkeeper Timo Horn to make Bundesliga return after three-year-hiatus
arts.sum: Former Köln keeper Timo Horn will be making his first Bundesliga start in nearly three years on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Niko Kovac commits to starting Emre Can against Bochum
arts.sum: BVB trainer Niko Kovac had much to reveal about his weekend squad selection when speaking at his Friday press conference.
